title: The reformed librarie-keeper with a supplement to The reformed-school, as subordinate to colleges in universities / by John Durie ; whereunto is added, I. An idea of mathematicks II. The description of one of the chiefest libraries which is in Germanie ...
author: Dury, John, 1596-1680.
publisher: Printed by William Du-Gard, and are to bee [sic] sold by Rob. Littleberrie ...,
